snippet: The man, Kenneth Miley, 54, was arrested after his 11-year-old grandson brought the handgun, a 9-millimeter pistol, to school in his backpack, the police said.
lead_paragraph: The man, Kenneth Miley, 54, was arrested after his 11-year-old grandson brought the handgun, a 9-millimeter pistol, to school in his backpack, the police said.

headline.main: Queens Man Is Arrested After His Grandson Brings a Loaded Pistol to School
